review: First of all, the doctor made the sickness appear very common which was very comforting and made us realise that there's nothing to panic about the child's condition. He advised upon the kind of diet to be given during sickness as well as in general stressing upon the benefits of healthy diet in kids. He was very friendly with the child. The prescription, for the ailment the child was going through, was given and explained very well. The experience with Dr Shashibhushan has always been very pleasant and stress relieving.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very child friendly and patient in understanding our concerns. My 7.5 months baby had severe loose Motions and we were really worried and prepared for hospitalisation but doctor seeing the child’s activieness recommended that we take the baby home unlike other doctors who would have suggested admission. Doctor even explained how imp it is to keep baby hydrated all the while.  Waiting time was also not much unlike other hospitals where in spite of having confirmed appts patients are made to wait endlessly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: (B/O Deekshitha)Doctor is friendly and soft spoken. He checked the baby thoroughly and explained to the point what needs to be done. He made sure the ***** treatment is given to the baby and did not wait even a second to call up the reception and inform a room to be booked in our name for admission since the baby had jaundice. I would recommend the doctor for all. The only thing I would suggest is that the people who take the appointment should make sure that wait period should not exceed. Nothing against the doctor though, being a good doctor takes it's toll.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is wonderful person. He is so kind, caring and polite. He answers to all my questions and never seems to be in a rush to move on the next patient.He is so friendly with my son.  He is the number1 pediatric doctor. I have recommended Dr. Shashibhushan to numerous people.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** **** *** ******** **** *** **** ******** since we had bought the vaccine from outside. Doctor advised that it is against the hospital rules. But I would like to question the hospital that if we can get the same medicines outside at a discounted price why shouldn't we be allowed to get the same. Your pharmacy doesn't provide any discount at all. We save almost 3k to 4k when we get the vaccines ourselves. I suggest your hospital to have a human side as well when dealing with patients. Everyone may not be rich and prosperous to pay and they will see ways to save money along with protecting their children from diseases. Your treatment and services are really good. There is no doubt about that. But this part also should be considered. Else we may have to look for a different doctor from next time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The best thing about this doc is that he listens the patient's concerns very calmly and clearly, later he suggests the solution accordingly.
He does connects with the kids very easily and develops a relationship with them.
He provides clear suggestions to parents and prescribes all the necessary steps.
As a doctor, he is very friendly, curtageos, kind hearted, calm etc.
Rating for sure 5 out of 5.

Dr shashubhushan is a very good and friendly doctor.. the way he co-ordinate with the baby s too good..he listens to our questions in patience and answers them...even though it may be a silly one... If v r scared for some particular reason,he will comfort us and take time to answer and make us understand.. very down to earth person... i will recommend him to those who is looking for a good pedeatrician for their child.

Our first consultation with Dr. Shashi bhushan was on 20th April 2017. Our 8 month old baby girl had severe allergy on her skin.The doctor was very patient enough to hear our queries, he answers all our questions and he reduced our tension with a very assuring tone.

I would recommend Dr.shahsibushan to all the parents who needs more than the treatment for there lil one's

Doctor is very good with kids, he handles them very well, hence my kids are very comfortable.
As a parents we will have lots of doubts on baby's health & vaccinations, he clears all the doubts very patiently & must say he is
Very down to earth person.

Good luck n continue the same .
